chats.name: Greeting room
chats.chat_description: Your journey is about to begin. You are one step away from a new adventure full of wanderings and unknown. Do not hesitate, stranger!

chats.name: Unicornland
chats.status: This room is for true girls
chats.chat_description: Boys are not allowed. Peace, love and unicorns reign here. Girl, today we will decorate this world with all the colors of the rainbow, so hurry up to us!

chats.name: Garage
chats.chat_description: We're all family in the garage, so don't worry. Brother for brother, so to speak. Beer and snacks are always here, so don't be shy if you come by.
